summary.para: The class representing the Chart Designer used to design a chart at runtime.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Designer.ChartDesigner.#ctor(System.Object)

summary.para: Creates an instance of the ChartDesigner class.

member.param: A object.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Designer.ChartDesigner.#ctor(System.Object,System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost)

summary.para: Creates an instance of the ChartDesigner class.

member.param: A object.
An object of a class implementing the IDesignerHost interface.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Designer.ChartDesigner.ShowDialog

summary.para: Invokes the Chart Designer for the chart control.

member.returns: A enumeration member that indicates the return value of a dialog box.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Designer.ChartDesigner.ShowDialog(System.Boolean)

summary.para: Invokes the Chart Wizard for the chart control with the specified topmost parameter indicating whether the chart wizard is displayed on top.

member.param: A value that specifies whether the chart wizard should be shown as the topmost dialog box.
member.returns: A enumeration member that indicates the return value of a dialog box.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Designer.ChartDesigner.ShowDialog(DevExpress.LookAndFeel.UserLookAndFeel)

summary.para: Invokes the Chart Designer for the chart control with Look And Feel painting scheme applied.

member.param: A object that specifies the painting scheme.
member.returns: A enumeration member that indicates the return value of a dialog box.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Designer.ChartDesigner.ShowDialog(DevExpress.LookAndFeel.UserLookAndFeel,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Invokes the Chart Designer for the chart control with the Look And Feel painting scheme applied and specified topmost parameter indicating whether the chart wizard is the topmost dialog box..

member.param: A object that specifies the painting scheme.
A value that specifies whether the chart wizard should be shown as the topmost dialog box.
member.returns: A enumeration member that indicates the return value of a dialog box.

summary.para: Represents a Chart Wizard page which enables modification of the properties of series, including name, visibility, scale type, sorting, point and other options.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.WizardSeriesPage.HiddenPageTabs

summary.para: Provides access to a collection of SeriesPageTab enumeration values, representing the hidden tabs.

member.value: A object, representing a collection of enumeration values for the hidden tabs at the Wizard's Series page.

summary.para: A collection of page tabs to be hidden on the Chart wizard page.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.ChartPageTabCollection.Add(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.ChartPageTab)

summary.para: Appends the page tab of the specified type to the current collection of hidden page tabs.

member.param: A enumeration value, which specifies the page tab to append to the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.ChartPageTabCollection.AddRange(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.ChartPageTab[])

summary.para: Appends an array of page tabs of the specified type to the current collection of hidden page tabs.

member.param: An array of enumeration values, which specify page tabs to append to the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.ChartPageTabCollection.Remove(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.ChartPageTab)

summary.para: Removes the tab of the specified type from the collection of hidden tabs.

member.param: A enumeration value, specifying the type of a page tab to be removed from the collection.

A collection of page tabs to be hidden on the Data wizard page.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.DataPageTabCollection.Add(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.DataPageTab)

summary.para: Appends the page tab of the specified type to the current collection of hidden page tabs.

member.param: A enumeration value, which specifies the page tab to append to the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.DataPageTabCollection.AddRange(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.DataPageTab[])

summary.para: Appends an array of page tabs of the specified type to the current collection of hidden page tabs.

member.param: An array of enumeration values, which specify page tabs to append to the collection.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.DataPageTabCollection.Remove(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Wizard.DataPageTab)

summary.para: Removes the tab of the specified type from the collection of hidden tabs.

member.param: A enumeration value, specifying the type of a page tab to be removed from the collection.
